document_data.name: Kaniaka Akannathi
document_data.mainbody: '''Kaniaka Stormcrow Akannathi''' was an elderly matron of the [[Akannathi]] clan of [[goliath]]s that lived within [[Skytower Shelter]] in the [[Spine of the World]] mountains during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: In her elderly years Kaniaka was afflicted with blindness. She also had a keen sense of hearing, and could easily distinguish sounds made from individuals smaller than her fellow goliaths.
document_data.Relationships:
Kaniaka lived with her son [[Harad Akannathi|Harad]], and his husband [[Arn Akannathi|Arn]], the chieftain of their clan. Her words held great influence over the chief and their fellow clanmates.

She kept a domesticated [[crag cat]] within their familial cave, which served as a companion and protector.
